tasks.description: Tasks to run (comma-separated: cleanup, dead-links, licenses, audit, queue-monitor, secrets)

items.name: Phase 3 CI Auto-Healing: Security & Build Diagnostics

trigger_deep_remediation.description: Force deep remediation even if not triggered by failures

target_url.description: Target URL to check (defaults to production)

slot.description: Time slot to post (breakfast, lunch, snack, dinner, evening, late-night, or manual)

force_run.description: Force run audit even if recent run exists

items.name: Monitor Queue Health & Scan if Needed
